CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( Status, 'ON HOLD'), IF(NOT(ISBLANK(On_Hold_time_temp__c)),ROUND((On_Hold_time_temp__c+( NOW() - On_Hold_start_time__c ) * 24), 2),IF(NOT(ISBLANK(On_Hold_start_time__c )),ROUND(( NOW() - On_Hold_start_time__c ) * 24,2),null)),IF(NOT(ISBLANK(On_Hold_time_temp__c)),On_Hold_time_temp__c,null))
CustomField.label: Total On Hold time
